        // Custom behavior
        return;

      // Default behavior
      insertBreak();

    deleteBackward(unit) {
      const block = editor.api.block();
      
      if (/* Custom condition */) {
        // Custom behavior
        return;
      }
      
      deleteBackward(unit);
    },
    
    resetBlock(options) {
      if (/* Custom condition */) {
        // Custom behavior
        return true;
      }
      
      return resetBlock(options);
    },
  },
}));
